title: H2Z tableware "Happy Engagement Couple" Champagne Glass, 10 1/2-Inch
features: PREMIUM QUALITY: 10.5" double figurine in a cocktail glass, packaged in a printed box, is made from polyresin and glass.
IN-HOUSE DESIGN: "Happy Engagement" text is printed on the base of the glass.
PERFECT FOR GIFTING: Perfect for gifting to a couple on their engagement.
MORE PRODUCTS: Other figurines in the same style are also available.
Packaged in a gift ready box
description: Let the party begin with this fabulous couple celebrating their engagement. The figurine is removable from the functional champagne glass. From the Hiccup line by Pavilion Gift. Celebrate with this fantastic gift for your friends!.
